node.name: Microwave Oven MAKE: SAMSUNG MODEL: MS23F301TAK/TL
node.description: High temperature regulation for reheating and cooking but not for baking purpose allows the oven to maintain the temperature up to 500 degree celcius. Ceramic cavity resist the chemical attacks of food and advance monitoring function which also put the oven at child lock. (SIZE: 489x275x374mm / WEIGHT: 12 Kg / POWER: 1150 watts)
node.content: Eco range product from well-known brand and advancement in technology for rapid cooking but not suitable for baking purpose / In a simple manner to understand this microwave oven can cook "Pizza" but not the "meat" / Anti-bacterial and scratch proof cavity is easy to maintain with any common Kitchen cleaning solvent / With maximum cooking time of 99 minutes it becomes most bought item for small eatery shops in India / Controlling section is also updated with co-functioning of button and digital inputs while child lock is provided to make it avoidable item by minors / Temperature can reach up to 500 degree Celsius and recipes like baking cake is easy to make in this microwave oven.
node.alt: Samsung 23 L Solo Microwave Oven (MS23F301TAK/TL, Black)

node.name: Convection Microwave Oven MAKE: GODREJ MODEL: GME 523 CF1 RM PLAIN ELEC
node.description: Convection oven use fans to push heated air inside the cavity so that whole environment cook food evenly and faster while making its secondary option as small oven. Capacity that match small families and purpose that satisfy baking, grilling and deep fry cooking. (SIZE: 480x290x405mm / WEIGHT: 14 Kg / POWER: 800 watts)
node.content: This small scale convection oven from Indian brand has ability to use for browning or broiling of meat / Temperature that can raise to 600 degree Celsius and cavity capacity of 23 litre makes it satisfy cooking item at flesh loving homes / With no button control system user need to give command through touch pads and monitor the selection into LED screen / Outer body is of stainless steel which is rust proof and also provide resistance to chemicals of food while interior cavity is also of steel / Child lock safety for minors and warranty of 1 year while 5 year warranty is provided on internal components like Magnetron & Cavity / Internal fans produce little or no sound and for energy efficient 3 stars rating is governed by the Bureau of Indian Standards on this convection microwave oven.
node.alt: Godrej 23 L Convection Microwave Oven (GME 523 CF1 RM Plain Elec, Black)

node.name: Microwave MAKE: BAJAJ MODEL: 1000TSS
node.description: Small capacity and capability for only dry heat baking at temperature under 250 degree Celsius  makes this oven not for cooking but for re-heating purpose of cold food. Adjustable timer and body made of grade 305 stainless steel which can handle rough tear-wear. (SIZE: 410x360x240mm / WEIGHT: 3.8 Kg / POWER: 800 watts)
node.content: Backbone company of India that has one of the discipline working in electronics market regarding the durability of product or types of products / Mostly seen this 10 litre capacity microwave oven on confectionery shops, plugged for more than 14 hours a day and put average monthly expenditure of 300 rupees just because power consumption of 800 watts / 250 degree Celsius is equivalent to very hot temperature of gas flames but still "Pizza" is not recommended to made under this microwave / For household users baking, grilling and toasting are options limited for this microwave while they can set the timer limit for 60 minutes and can perform alternate household chores / Outer body is of stainless steel which is rust proof and also provide resistance to chemicals of food while interior cavity is also of steel.

node.name: Microwave Oven MAKE: WHIRLPOOL MODEL: MAGICOOK PRO SOLO 30
node.description: With large capacity of 30 litres and auto cook function for more than 20 items make this microwave oven most desirable item to be placed in Kitchen. Cook vegetables or Bake meat, it can perform any cooking task under temperature 600 degree Celsius. (SIZE: 539x398x319mm / WEIGHT: 15 Kg / POWER: 1400 watts)
node.content: Most purchased microwave oven from online and therefore many registered complains like defected product by seller or sold old goods / Leading giant in home appliance business from America made this all-purpose Microwave oven that has cavity capacity for full grown un-cut chicken which means one can use this against bird-flu disease like directly place the Chicken inside it and sterilize under definite temperature / With no button control system user need to give command through touch pads and monitor the selection into LED screen / Innovative feature like auto cook menus for more than 20 items like "Popcorns", "Halwa", "Basic-Idli", "Dhokla" and "Roast-Meat" / 1 year warranty is provided by the manufacturer so in case of user get the defective product, they can directly replace the product.
node.alt: Whirlpool 30 L Solo Microwave Oven (MAGICOOK PRO SOLO 30, Black)
